descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a task

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a task

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve a task

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve many tasks

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a task

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: creater_id
options.description: ID of the user who created the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: outcome_id
options.description: ID of the outcome of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: task_type_id
options.description: ID of the type of task

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: ID of the account to update
accountId.ai_hint: ID of the account to update

view.name: view
view.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
view.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: creater_id
options.description: ID of the user who created the sales activity. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: dueDate
options.description: Timestamp that denotes when the task is due to be completed

options.name: outcome_id
options.description: ID of the outcome of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: owner_id
options.description: ID of the user to whom the task is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: targetable_id
options.description: ID of the entity for which the task is updated. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type".

options.name: targetable_type
options.description: Type of the entity for which the task is updated

options.name: task_type_id
options.description: ID of the type of task

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the task

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

fromDate.name: fromDate
fromDate.description: Timestamp that denotes the start of appointment. Start date if this is an all-day appointment.
fromDate.ai_hint: Timestamp that denotes the start of appointment. Start date if this is an all-day appointment.

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: Timestamp that denotes the end of appointment. End date if this is an all-day appointment.
endDate.ai_hint: Timestamp that denotes the end of appointment. End date if this is an all-day appointment.

attendees.name: attendees

values.name: userId
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

attendees.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

appointmentId.name: appointmentId
appointmentId.description: ID of the appointment to update
appointmentId.ai_hint: ID of the appointment to update

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of the contact to update
contactId.ai_hint: ID of the contact to update

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: ID of the deal to update
dealId.ai_hint: ID of the deal to update

targetableType.name: targetableType
targetableType.description: Type of the entity for which the task is updated
targetableType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

targetable_id.name: targetable_id
targetable_id.description: ID of the entity for which the task is created. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type".
targetable_id.ai_hint: ID of the entity for which the task is created. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type".

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.description: ID of the note to update
noteId.ai_hint: ID of the note to update

sales_activity_type_id.displayName: Sales Activity Type Name or ID
sales_activity_type_id.name: sales_activity_type_id
sales_activity_type_id.description: ID of a sales activity type for which the sales activity is created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
sales_activity_type_id.ai_hint: ID of a sales activity type for which the sales activity is created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

ownerId.name: ownerId
ownerId.description: ID of the user to whom the task is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
ownerId.ai_hint: ID of the user to whom the task is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

from_date.name: from_date
from_date.description: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.description: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity
end_date.ai_hint: Timestamp that denotes the end of sales activity

salesActivityId.name: salesActivityId
salesActivityId.description: ID of the salesActivity to update
salesActivityId.ai_hint: ID of the salesActivity to update

query.name: query
query.description: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities
query.ai_hint: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities

entities.name: entities
entities.description: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities
entities.ai_hint: Enter a term that will be used for searching entities

searchField.name: searchField

options.name: Custom Field
options.description: Only allowed custom fields of type "Text field", "Number", "Dropdown" or "Radio button"

searchField.description: Field against which the entities have to be searched
searchField.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
entities
options.description: Use 'entities' to query against related entities. You can include multiple entities at once, provided the field is available in both entities or else you'd receive an error response.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

dueDate.name: dueDate
dueDate.description: Timestamp that denotes when the task is due to be completed
dueDate.ai_hint: Timestamp that denotes when the task is due to be completed

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: ID of the task to update
taskId.ai_hint: ID of the task to update

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'account' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'view'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'appointment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromDate'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'endDate'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'attendees'
IF type == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF type == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'appointmentId'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'appointmentId'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'appointmentId'
IF resource == 'appointment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'emails'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'view'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'amount'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'view'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'targetableType'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'targetable_id'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sales_activity_type_id'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'ownerId'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'from_date'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'end_date'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'targetableType'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'targetable_id'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'salesActivityId'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'salesActivityId'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'salesActivityId'
IF resource == 'salesActivity' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'entities'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'query' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchField'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'lookup' AND searchField == 'customField' THEN SHOW parameter 'customFieldName'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'lookup' AND searchField == 'customField' THEN SHOW parameter 'customFieldValue'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'lookup' AND searchField IN ["email", "name"] THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'dueDate'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'ownerId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'targetableType'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'targetable_id'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
